<p>[vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]Þingflokkur Pírata, Alþingishúsinu, 101 Reykjavík</p>
<p><a href="http://www.althingi.is/thingmenn/thingflokkar/piratar/">Upplýsingar um þingflokk Pírata á vef Alþingis</a></p>
<p>Starfsmaður þingflokks er Eiríkur Rafn Rafnsson, netfang: eirikurrafn@althingi.is.</p>
<p>Höfuðstöðvar Pírata</p>
<p>Síðumúla 23, 108 Reykjavík<br />
Sími: <a href="tel:5462000">546-2000</a><br />
Netfang: <a href="mailto:piratar@piratar.is">piratar@piratar.is</a></p>
<p>English:</p>
<p>Inquiries and media requests directed to the parliamentary group or specific members of parliament for the Pirate Party should be directed to Eiríkur Rafn Rafnsson, eirikurrafn@althingi.is.</p>
<p>General inquiries on the Pirate Party that is not specifically directed to the parliamentary group, specific members of parliament or other elected Pirates should be directed to piratar@piratar.is[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_gmaps link="#E-8_" title="Höfuðstöðvar"][/vc_column][/vc_row]</p>
